name: Application and Reports
content:
Application:-


We have 5 Section in Application such as :-


Descriptive Analysis:-

  • In Descriptive Analysis we are doing data exploration and workflow associated with that is - 01-Invoice-Data-EDA
  • We can filter data and check variation in different graphs


Customer Segments Training:-

  • we can select features on which we want to train cluster model
  • we can select cluster model
  • We can filter specific data and check how cluster is coming
  • Workflow associated with that is -02-Customer-Segmentation-Clustering


Customer Segments Prediction:-

  • We can upload new file and execute to see segmentation's on new data
  • Workflow associated with that is -03-Customer-Segmentation-Prediction


Customer Segmentation Analysis

  • On Predicted data we can analyse pattern in each segments
  • Get insights such as:- Segment 2 is with less number of customer i.e 135 customers with highest Monthly Revenue of $215
  • Segment 1 customer's Avg subscription in months is 20
  • Segment 2 customer's median total recurring charges is highest
  • Segment 3 customer's median total recurring charges is lowest
  • Segment 0 customer's median dropped call is lowest
  • Segment 3 customer's median dropped call is lowest
  • Segment 3 customer's median dropped call is Highest
  • Workflow associated with that is -04-Customer-Segmentation-Predicted-Data-Analysis


Report:-

  • In this we can click on check overall report


Report:-


We have three section in report

Descriptive Analysis :-

  • Analyse Data before Segmentation modelling

Cluster Analysis :-

  • Analyse Data After Segmentation modelling

Deep Segmentation :-

  • Analyse each segment for more understanding about segment
